Topic.Title: My Wish List for Father Alexmas

Posts.EditableText:
here's my wish list...

[list:335yy93p]
[*:335yy93p]Save Game Feature[/*:m:335yy93p]
[*:335yy93p]Telnet Compatibility[/*:m:335yy93p]
[*:335yy93p]Ban Options[/*:m:335yy93p]
[*:335yy93p]30-50 player limit for free version/Unlimited player limit for payed version[/*:m:335yy93p]
[*:335yy93p]Ability to give players godly powers *(read more about this below)[/*:m:335yy93p]
[*:335yy93p]To be able to turn on a 5-10 second timer till server shutdown[/*:m:335yy93p]
[*:335yy93p]Being able to minimize the server window to the system tray[/*:m:335yy93p][/list:u:335yy93p]




*Godly powers will be given to those players who moderate the game or basically own the game.  With these abilities, your normal characters will be able to ban players, and get user info. (good for those who arnt running the server, yet you would like them to have those abilities).
